extendedInfo.description: Access the entire library catalog:   * Search for books, movies and music and more.   *Place holds.Manage your account:   * Check the status of your holds.   * Cancel holds.   * Check due dates.   * Renew items.   * View your account balance.Find a library:   * Get library locations and directions.   * Get library hours and phone numbers.   * Discover library events:   * Search for events at any or all libraries.   * Search by audience, language and type of event.   * Browse featured programs.Ask a question:   * Call us.   * Text a librarian 24/7.Connect and share:   * Facebook   * Twitter   * Flickr   * VimeoChoose your language (tap the list icon in the upper right):   * English   * EspaÃ±ol   * Chinese   * Russian   * Vietnamese

reviews.title: Great app for Multnomah County Library.
reviews.comment: So far, everything in this app works well. I am looking forward to seeing this app continue to get better.
reviews.author: Krystofer Milton

reviews.title: Works but needs an update
reviews.comment: It works relatively well, but could benefit from performance and UI improvements. Android has design guidelines these days.
reviews.author: Jay Porta

reviews.title: Fantastic ap!
reviews.comment: I love this ap, and use it nearly daily. The only thing missing is a \"return to list\" or back button that doest have to go thru all the screens to get back once I have put one book on hold. Even a \"start search over\" would be a welcome add once a book is placed on hold. Thanks library dev team for an otherwise very well done up.
reviews.author: Carol Mason

reviews.title: Usually good
reviews.comment: Won\'t install on 4.3 on new nexus 7
reviews.author: Kade Swanson-Theisen

reviews.title: Doesn\'t open/work on Nexus 7 2013 tablet
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t open/work on Nexus 7 2013 tablet
reviews.author: Sidney Smith

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love being able to reserve books from my phone!
reviews.author: Alayna Painter

reviews.title: Its a good start
reviews.comment: The app works well but has a slow interface. I would like to see where it can remember your card number so u dont have to put it in everytime
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Be aware
reviews.comment: You can NOT access the entire library catalog with this app. Try a search at the library or via the web... then try the same search with this app. For example, search for \"The Great Courses\". You\'ll see. This is not the full Multnomah County Library Catalog, as described above. This is the \"Boopsie\" version. That being said... this app still has worth and potential. I use it often. [Note: Thanks for adding the \"renew all\" option recently! :) Much appreciated]
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loving it, thanks!
reviews.comment: No problems on droid x. Holds placed efficiently, info readily available and speedy. UI is fine. Can\'t please everybody no matter how it looks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please Update!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this forever. It\'s a great app when it works and utterly useless when it doesn\'t which is way too often. I guess since it\'s the only option the developers aren\'t all that concerned about improving the app but I would happily pay for something stable and reliable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great So Far
reviews.comment: What a great app! First time using it I found what I was after and put a hold on it. Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ughhh
reviews.comment: This app always logs me out. I see how that would be a good safety precaution, but it\'s my phone... also, it would be really helpful if it sent a message or alarm to you when books are about to be overdue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, but...
reviews.comment: This is one of the most useful apps on my phone, but as someone stated earlier, it does not include the entire MCL catalog. I would definitely rate it 5 stars if it did!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great! HTC Amaze 4G.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: a great local app for portland
reviews.comment: Works great. An outstanding app when browsing the library.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: The app is easier to check my account, put items on hold, and browse the database than the web version! Brava!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, works well
reviews.comment: Very powerful app allows me to do almost anything I can do from the full website. One bug though: often force closes when I switch orientation from portrait to landscape or vice versa.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Gotta love this app. I hope other Libraries follow suit and begin adding ebooks and Phone apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great!
reviews.author: A Google User
